body:
First, let me say thanks for doing this. You are doing the FSM's work here. 

I don't know if JSONP and CORS are out of scope, but having run into problems with cross-origin ajax requests over the last two days, it is something I could've used a hint about. (Still can't figure out why respond_with doesn't seem to work with rack/cors)

Also, a clear list of what the callback events are and how to use them - I couldn't seem to get a handler bound to :failure, and wound up binding to ;error instead.

I'm on a plane to PDX tomorrow AM, so I'll give this some thought when I'm in the air, and I'm sure to think of other stuff I had to google for. 

Thanks again!
